data.title: Prowler P20 Robotic Cleaner
data.meta_description: Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Cleaner - Please call us on 01268 206560 for any Vacuum Cleaners Robotic Cleaners or any swimming pool products
data.text:
Description

Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Pool Cleaner Electric Swimming Pool Cleaner Floor Wall and Waterline for pools up to 12m

1. Description

Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Swimming Pool Cleaners are manufactured to the highest specification, offering the best quality and highest reliability at an extremely competitive price.

The features that set the Pentair P20 Prowler Robotic Pool Cleaner above so many others are the extremely lightweight body and the “steerable” option using the smartphone app .

Weighing less than 6kg the Pentair Prowler P20 Robot Pool Cleaner can be almost half the weight of similar cleaners that are in the UK market. This makes it usable by just about anybody, as lifting the cleaner out of the water is so much easier than lifting any other brand. It even has a “Quick Empty” port to allow the water to drain back into the pool as soon as it is lifted.

The additional facility of having the ability to control the steering with an app, means that the Pentair Prowler P20 Robot Cleaner removes the main bugbear that pool owners with Robotic cleaners have, and that is that not every centimetre of the pool can be cleaned on a standard cycle. Once your chosen cycle has finished, just open the app and steer the Pentair Prowler P20 into the corners or any places where debris was missed. You will have the cleanest pool of any pool owner

Cleaning the floor, walls and waterline the Pentair Prowler P20 offers the same cleaning capabilities of pool cleaners twice the price, with the reassurance of the world-famous Pentair brand. Pentair have been known for many, many years in the UK pool industry for their reliability and quality.

Ideal for pools up to 12m x 6m this is a great value robotic pool cleaner that will provide clean water and clean floors and walls.

With Beach Entry Detection included the Pentair Prowler P20 is suitable for just about every pool.

Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Pool Cleaner

Cleans floor, wall & waterline

16 m cable for pools up to 12m length

Ultra-light weight with 5.75 kg

Top access to filters

Smart navigation, gyroscope and beach entry detection

“Clean Now” filter indicator light

3 cleaning cycles: 1.5 hr, 2 hr and 2.5 hr

Remote control via Bluetooth

Fitted with a smart navigation system, the Prowler P20 starts by:

scanning the pool

optimising its cleaning

adapting its speed to the slope of the pool

2. Features

Superior level of cleaning

Methodical and efficient cleaning of the whole pool

Fine filtration – quick to clean

Ultra light < 6kg

Hyper compact dimensions

No cable entanglement

High suction flow rate

Smart navigation with automatic course correction

Optimal displacement

Filtration 100 microns

Ultra easy top access

Basket easy to clean with a garden hose

For pools up to 12m in length (16m cable)

Lightweight and easy to handle (5.75 kg)

Access to the filters from the top of the robot

(2 filter baskets for double filtration)

Fast and optimal movement with unparalleled cleaning quality
